pageContext.claim: “Apple prices may increase because of the massive Tariffs we may be imposing on China - but there is an easy solution where there would be ZERO tax, and indeed a tax incentive. Make your products in the United States instead of China. Start building new plants now. Exciting! #MAGA”
pageContext.analysis: Apple relies on Chinese manufacturing for many of its products, but also on U.S. manufacturers. "Each of Apple’s core products relies on parts or materials made in the US or provided by US-based suppliers," the company says. Trump says Apple should manufacture everything in the United States, but that's not realistic considering the dynamics of the global economy and the fact that Apple is one of the largest companies in the world.
